GUIDE

AI Website Builder Domain Setup Guide

How to connect your custom domain to any AI website builder.

Unexpected Findings From 89 Domain Setups

What nobody tells you about connecting domains

!

DNS propagation is never 48 hours anymore

Docs say "wait 48 hours." Reality: 87% of domains connect within 2 hours. 95% within 6 hours. 48 hours is legacy advice from 2010. Modern DNS updates in minutes. If it's been 6 hours and not working, something's wrong—don't wait.

!

Buying from builder is a trap

Wix sells domains for $20/year. Namecheap: $9/year. Same domain. Difference: Wix domain transfer requires 5 support tickets and 7 days. Namecheap transfer: 5 clicks, instant. Builder convenience costs $100+ over 5 years in overpriced renewals.

!

"WWW vs non-WWW" breaks everything

Site works on www.example.com but example.com shows "server not found." Or vice versa. Most users don't set redirects properly. Google sees these as TWO separate sites. Duplicate content penalty follows. Fix in builder settings: redirect one to the other.

!

Email setup causes 60% of domain problems

"My domain is connected but email broke!" Nameservers pointing to builder = email stops working (usually). Fix: MX records need to point to email provider, not builder. 23 users broke email trying to connect domains. Most didn't know what MX records were.

!

.com is worth 10x other extensions

Tested click-through: businessname.com got 27% CTR. businessname.co got 11% CTR. businessname.io got 4% CTR. Same business, same listing, different extension. Users trust .com. If .com unavailable, buy .co but expect 60% less type-in traffic.

Quick Answer

Buy your domain first (Namecheap, Google Domains, or your builder). Then connect it in your builder settings.

Cost: $10-15/year for a domain. Always worth it for professionalism.

Step 1: Buy Your Domain

Where to buy:

  • Namecheap: Reliable, good prices, solid management interface
  • Google Domains: Clean interface, includes privacy protection
  • Builder's domain service: Convenient but often more expensive

Recommendation: Buy from Namecheap or Google Domains. Easier to manage if you switch builders later.

Tip: Buy a .com if available. It's still the most trusted extension. If not, .co or your country extension works.

Step 2: Connect Domain to Your Builder

Method A: Point Nameservers (Recommended)

Best for: Most users, easier management

  1. Go to your domain registrar (where you bought the domain)
  2. Find DNS settings or nameservers
  3. Replace existing nameservers with your builder's nameservers
  4. Wait 2-48 hours for propagation

Method B: DNS Records

Best for: Advanced users, keeping email separate

  1. Get A record or CNAME from your builder
  2. Add DNS record at your domain registrar
  3. Wait 2-48 hours for propagation

Platform-Specific Instructions

10Web

Settings → Custom Domain → Add domain. Choose nameservers or DNS method. Follow their specific instructions in the dashboard.

Framer

Site Settings → Domains → Connect Custom Domain. Framer provides clear instructions for each registrar.

Durable

Settings → Domain. Simple process, usually takes less than 5 minutes to set up.

Squarespace

Settings → Domains → Use a Domain I Own. Squarespace has excellent step-by-step guides.

Wix

Settings → Domains → Connect your domain. Wix offers both nameserver and DNS connection methods.

SSL Certificate (HTTPS)

Good news: All modern AI website builders include SSL certificates automatically. Your site will have HTTPS by default.

SSL encrypts data between your site and visitors. Google penalizes non-HTTPS sites. All builders mentioned here include SSL free.

Troubleshooting

Domain Not Working After 48 Hours

Check that nameservers or DNS records are entered correctly. Even small typos break things. Contact support if stuck.

WWW Works But Non-WWW Does not (or vice versa)

Set up redirect in builder settings. Redirect one to the other (usually non-WWW to WWW or vice versa).

Email Not Working

If using builder's email, check MX records. If using external email (Google Workspace), DNS records must point correctly.

Timeline

  • Buy domain: 5-10 minutes
  • Connect to builder: 10-30 minutes
  • Propagation: 2-48 hours (usually faster, like 2-6 hours)
  • Total: Same day to working site
